name: Pulled Pork
description:
H-h-hay hay hay!

The Piggs have gotten loose and you have to put them back in the pen! It's an epic first-person beatdown farm game!

An incredible MS Painted nightmare!

Grapple things with Left Click / Right Click!

Kick things with F!

Made for the Low Effort Game Jam 13 by Titus Morrison, Lance Morrison, and Ivo Morrison. Pretty fun and chill game to make. Except for the UI. Making UI sucks and is not Low Effort™. 

Also yes we actually textured everything in MS Paint.
